message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.SE

This paper discusses the vulnerabilities and attacks on Critical Infrastructures (CI) that rely on communication systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper specifically focuses on LTE's air interface and radio access procedure, which are part of the network infrastructure (cs.NI) and system engineering (cs.SY) subcategories. The paper also mentions the use of smart attacks, which could potentially involve artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper provides recommendations for improving the robustness of mission-critical communications, which could involve software engineering (cs.SE).
